name: sudic-internal-backend
description: Express backend for Sudic Internal Dashboard

scripts.free-port: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 3001 -State Listen -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object { $_.OwningProcess -ne 0 } | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_.OwningProcess -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; Write-Host 'Port 3001 cleared.'"
